entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Performance regression - Allocation/WorkingSet on PlaintextPlatform #79774
  • WriteEntry_LongFileSize tests failing in CI #79773
  • Binding a dictionary mutates existing values instead of replacing #79770
  • [API Proposal]: Add IsEmpty property to collections and arrays. #79769
  • ConfigurationBinder doesn't honor pre-existing ISet when binding #79766
    8.0.0
  • Analyzer proposal: Remove unused resources #79765
  • Ensure that JIT and other IL compilers preserve order of data dependent memory accesses #79764
  • Improve Enum function performance (TryParse, ToString, Parse, etc...) #79762
  • `Environment.GetFolderPath(ApplicationData)` returns empty string on linux under root account #79757
  • System.Collections.Immutable version 7.0.0 warns about not supporting .net 7.0 #79756
  • [API Proposal]: Provide path information for custom JsonException error messages in System.Text.Json #79755
    Future
  • issues of milestone 8.0.0 already fixed/present in 7.0.1 #79752
  • JIT: invalid flags handling by fgMorphStoreDynBlock #79750
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricEventSourceTests.EventSourceFiltersInstruments failing in CI (Outerloop) #79749
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] EFIGS shard lacks currencies that it should serve #79740
    8.0.0
  • TaskWebClientTest.UploadValues_Success test is failing #79731
    8.0.0
  • HTTP/3 checker website claims it supports HTTP/3, but HttpClient throws VER_NEG_ERROR #79729
  • [Weird] HTTP/3 does not work after publishing app, but works on debug and release #79727
  • Expose System.Linq.Expressions.CanCompileToIL feature switch #79726

Closed

  • Test failure: ConvertScalarToVector128UInt32UInt32 #79558
    8.0.0
  • Upgrading from netcore3.1 to net6.0 breaks relative path support in SQLCommand #70989
    Future
  • Dogfooding instructions for .NET 8 NativeAOT on macOS x64 via Rosetta #79253
    8.0.0
  • SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose failed with ObjectDisposedException #75354
    8.0.0
  • Document the memory model guaranteed by dotnet/runtime runtimes #63474
    Future
  • Unused resources analyzer #79745
  • [browser][tests] Potential memory leak of cached Completion Task #46566
    Future
  • Inconsistent generation on a timestamp value using DateTimeOffset #79743
  • [mono] Implement GC.TryStartNoGCRegion, GC.RegisterForFullGCNotification and GCSettings.LatencyMode #79758
    Future
  • Verify limitation in Compiler::impCanPInvokeInlineCallSite still applies #330
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Implicit operators for Task<T> #79746
  • SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated returns wrong value when cached creds are used #65563
    8.0.0
  • Span bounds checking not fully eliminated in some cases when index is constant and length is known #1115
    Future
  • RyuJIT properly optimizes structs with a single field if the field type is int but not if it is double #4323
    Future
  • Perf work around System V classification implementation. #4576
    Future
  • Make LINQ providers (Queryable) compatible with NativeAOT #79199
    8.0.0
  • Fix or delete tests that make invalid assumptions (about codegen or anything else) #5888
    Future
  • Floating point benchmark performance difference Linux vs. Windows #6058
    Future
  • JIT: remove redundant load-after-store bounds-checks #6514
    Future
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces() on Android leads to FileNotFoundException #77441
  • Remove FEATURE_COMPILE define constant from System.Linq.Expressions #32878
    Future
  • Blazor Web Assembly (.NET 7 RC2) - Debugger crashes on VS 2022 after OIDC redirect, again #77013
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix numbering of exposed `LCL_VAR`s #79772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Transform local indirections off of `TYP_BLK` locals; support numbering exposed LCL_FLDs #79771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update analyzers.md #79768
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Enable AD0001 #79767
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type Intptr* is passed to delegate #79763
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #79760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable a few outerloop tests and update issue numbers #79759
  • [wasm] Convert exception messages to resource #79754
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix indir flags propagation for a couple of cases #79751
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix switch peeling flags propagation #79748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up some old style walks and QMARK validation #79747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix crash when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is passed non delegate type #79744
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Delete some commented tests #79742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Ensure that `TryGetContainableHWIntrinsicOp` is non-mutating #79363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes #79558 #79681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix failing coreclr tests in `runincontext` mode #79705
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Change the default for ilc compiler architecture #79761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • improve SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose test #79718
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • disable SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws #79730
    area-System.Net.Security, disabled-test
  • add EventSource log to alpn on macOS #79737
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.0
  • Memory model document. #75790
    documentation, area-Meta, memory model
  • Add nullable reference type annotations to System.Text.Json source gen #79613
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Improve spmi diffs summary report #79725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-Enable SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket Test #79145
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Avoid touching `NameMangler` during scanning #79738
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Allow passing vtypes with a single scalar field to nat… #79686
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Android] Fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated #79601
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79667
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Look up Queryable operator MethodInfos without MakeGenericMethod #79717
    area-System.Linq
  • Avoid hydrating type system entities for all of CoreLib #79732
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improve SIMD vector equality operator #79719
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Skip nested types in `EcmaModule.GetType` #79734
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not run recursive cycle detection on debug builds #79735
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make MethodDesc.IsStaticConstructor more efficient #79733
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • MacOS Ventura createdump fix - Part II #79728
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Support `x % {pow2_cns}` transformation for `ulong` types #79676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 4 #79324
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Ensure that OptionsCache only permits creating a single options instance per name #79639
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support deleting "entire" stores in the VN-based dead store removal phase #79505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move remaining HIR SIMDIntrinsics to SimdAsHWIntrinsic #79720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Dynamic generate hwintrinsic tests #79552
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Remaining feedback from ILLink merge #79677
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix WXORX issue in EEClass::Destruct #79703
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/6.0] Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #79620
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Added a null-check for 2-dim array access #79450
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79665
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Upgrade .NET Framework queue #79666
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #79215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reuse handles inside a loop in reflection_create_dynamic_metho… #79716
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Publishing Hello World for WebAssembly target on Windows arm64 fails #2121
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing is not working #2120
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Publishing Hello World for WebAssembly target on macOS arm64 (M1 Max) fails #2119

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: release tests fail but report success #2123

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: revert change that caused the Ilc exit status to be lost #2124

Merged

  • Attempt to fix package publishing #2125
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: temporarily remove assert for zero offset... #2118
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Revert publishAssetsImmediately addition #2122

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable support for WASI SDK #1850
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APICompat resources are not shipping in the SDK - missing localization #29598
  • global.json is ignored if the SDK version is not fully qualified #29597
  • Updating from 7.0.100 to 7.0.101 crashes msbuild on mac #29596

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for new output path format #29599

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29531
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29585
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge pull request #28707 from JanKrivanek/template-verifier #29568
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add class template #29518
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Common templates
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Additional location on CS8618 is lost with warnAsError = true #66037
    17.5
  • IDE0031 codefix shouldn't remove existing braces #66036
    Backlog

Closed

  • Warning about null value while value is set as not null #65406
    17.5
  • Perpetual 15-20% CPU Utilization from `ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe` #66014
  • SyntaxGenerator.MemberAccessExpression wraps result in parenthesis when a nullability modifier is detected #50260
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Only examine a pereference once when walking projects to produce inheritance tree #66043
    Area-IDE
  • Vs persisters #66042
    Area-IDE
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Include [UnscopedRef] parameter attributes in synthesized delegate types #66035
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Suppress semantic diagnostics from being reported by pull-diag-taggers until the project has fully loaded. #66034
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66032
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Avoid using Solution.Options in ConfigureCodeStyleOptionCodeFixProvider #66041
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support MemberNotNull on required members in nullable analysis #65987
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members, Next
  • Additional perf improvements for document highlights #66040
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Create initial subscription to roslyn analyzer updates #66033
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Improve performance of Document-Highlight-Refs #66023
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • run bootstrap build on linux #65942
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes and improvements for Run Code Analysis command #66010
    Area-Analyzers
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Correctly parse local function with several async modifiers #66030
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator for checked operators #63411
    Area-IDE, Community, 17.5
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor server Annotation Validators C# Error Message #45638
  • Cannot reference the type IResult in a non web project #45637
  • Perf regression: fortunes_gin, json_actix #45634
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_express #45633
  • Edit Form Loses Focus with authorize view policy #45632
  • Dotnet watch run command does not respect --no-launch-profile argument #45629
  • Optional Blazor Webassembly Components #45627
  • Add BaseDN to Ldapsettings #45626
  • Blazor wasm debugging SSL problem #45625
  • Using browserlink causes a 500 instead of a 404 response when an exception handling middleware is used #45622
  • Not disposing an IHost results in a memory leak #45621

Closed

  • Blazor server page route template "catch-all" gives error in case of double asterisk in the pattern #44067
    8.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: https, plaintext_express, plainTextSansFilter #45602
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #45614
  • Perf regression: https #45615

PullRequests

Created

  • Update repro.md #45636
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2068907 #45630
    area-mvc
  • [blazor][wasm] unify startup bit more #45628
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 8.0

Merged

  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22616.4 #44925
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [Servers] Fix test broken by Hosting log message format change #45631
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add a default value for SpaProxyKeepRunning #45616
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Add support for {**catch-all routes} in Blazor #45587
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Harden IPv6Any error handling #45529
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [AOT] Fix runtime warnings #45604
    area-runtime
  • Add Name Attribute to EditForm component EditContext cascading parameter. Doing it capable to impleme… #45599
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597
    area-infrastructure
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • ChecksumValidator: support SHA256 #45612
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    blocked, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45439
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45109
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Histogram/UpDownCounter counters are not shown when running `dotnet counters` tool #3542

Updated

  • dotnet-trace always detects 100% CPU usage #3554
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Change metrics parsing to use InvariantCulture #3558
  • [Feature branch changes, no review] Fixup counter apis #3559

Updated

  • Update docker images to latest tags #3535

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XML documentation refers to non-existing Device.OnIdiom / Device.OnPlatform methods #12183
  • Images in CollectionView displayed incorrectly #12182
  • Refreshing Observable Collection Generates InvalidOperationException #12181
  • Setting IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate programmatically doesn't work #12180
  • AVFoundation Migration to .NET 7 Maui #12176
  • iOS - Screen containing nested scrolling creating extra white space at the bottom #12175
  • Option to disable OnBackPressed in a BlazorWebView component #12171
  • Notes tutorial on macOS is blank #12166
  • [Bug] Shell NavigationStack[0] is always null, and Shell.PresentationMode="Modal" doesn't put the Page into ModalStack #12162
  • [Bug] ShellContent IsVisible causes wrong items displayed in flyout, on Windows #12159
  • iOS Page.LargeTitleDisplay does not work on iOS 16.1 Simulators #12156

Closed

  • ScrollView not working, not reacting to when keyboard is opened #9450
  • Azure DevOps builds failing with latest version of MAUI #12122
  • [iOS] CarouselView DataTemplateSelector NullReferenceException #9833
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Class Library build in the Release config fails to compile for the Windows target whereas Debug config works fine #12100
  • Android Release Mode app crash during startup #12165
  • Pair to Mac failed with the error "Failed to install manifest microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.net6 version 7.0.1..." #12046
  • Flickering WebView #12089
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.4.0 to 17.4.1 #12169
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12157
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • [net7.0] Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #12155

Merged

  • [net7.0] Don't add public api to net7.0 #12177
  • [net7.0] Improve BlazorWebView Docs #12168
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, t/docs 📝
  • [net6.0] Improve BlazorWebView Docs #12167
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Only set PublishReadyToRun for apps and not libs #12172
  • [net6.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12128
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • [net7.0] Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11791
    area/layout 🔲
  • [iOS] Fix crash using DataTemplateSelector CarouselView #12170
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #12141
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] [Android] Invalidate Button background drawable if size changes #12139
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Notify StrokeDashPattern changes with StrokeDashArray changes #12138
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #12147
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Make OnShouldReceiveMapTouch static #12142
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-map
  • [net7.0] Fix crash using BackButtonBehavior and navigating to root #12146
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix crash typing in Shell SearchHandler #12145
    area/shell 🐢
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #12148
  • Only set PublishReadyToRun for apps and not libs #12114
  • Improve BlazorWebView Docs #12135
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12108
    area/Xaml </>
  • Feat: Added "Keyboard.None" #11024
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using same type as nested owned property cause "Attempted to update or delete an entity that does not exist in the store" in disconnected state. #29877
  • Replacing PK to PK dependent with different type fails using in-memory provider #29875
  • Replacing PK to PK TPT or TPC dependent with different type fails #29874
  • Validate that the type mapping has a value comparer if the type is a non IEquatable reference type #29873
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Cosmos create too many IServiceProvider #29872

Closed

  • EF 7.0.1: EFCore 7.0 Bug - Invalid Operation Exception RE "Temporary Value" #29871
  • Allow UseSequence and HiLo on non-key properties #29758
    8.0.0
  • FromSqlInterpolated causes 'nvarchar' is not a recognized CURSOR option error #29870

PullRequests

Created

  • Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29876

Merged

  • Don't validate shared columns have the same provider type unless they are used in a key, foreign key or a unique index #29866
  • Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29805
  • Allow SQLServer Sequence/HiLo on non-key properties #29864
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Most of explicit and lazy loading for no-tracking queries #29865
  • [release/7.0] Revert shared columns validation breaking change #29867
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ubuntu 22.10 .Net 7 - Keep getting the message ".NET location: Not found" #15141

PullRequests
